name: Color Tiles Game - Colorful Block Puzzle
name_original: Color Tiles Game - Colorful Block Puzzle
description:
Relax and entertain yourself, train your logic and brain playing this nice designed, simple but challenging game!
Color Tiles Game - Colorful Block Puzzle is a nice and colorful tetris type classic block puzzle game.
User friendly combination of beautiful design and simplicity will help you to relax and enjoy this wonderful game for hours.
Easy to play - use your logic to move the different style and color blocks to fit in the field and collect points!
Compete with you FRIENDS and players all over the world - become the king of block puzzle!
Share this nice free block puzzle game with your family and friends to have fun together.

Color Tiles Game - Colorful Block Puzzle is made specially for you!
